A

Adds all methods from the given obj to the global scope.

Buscript - Class in buscript

Creates a new Buscript object, which is used to execute Javascript script files.

Creates a new Buscript object, which is used to execute Javascript script files.

BuscriptPlugin - Class in buscript
The main Plugin class which allows this script library to be run as a plugin and gives access to the command "run".

This method will remove any scripts scheduled to be executed for the target.
clearScriptCache() - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Clears scripts that have been cached so that they may be reloaded from the disk.

executeScript(File) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Executes the given scriptFile with no target.
executeScript(File, ScriptExecutor) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Executes the given scriptFile with no target and messages the given executor if anything goes wrong.
executeScript(File, String) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Executes the given scriptFile with the given target.
executeScript(File, String, ScriptExecutor) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Executes the given scriptFile with the specified target and messages the given executor if anything goes wrong.
executeScript(String, String) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Executes the given script string (literal javascript) with no target.
executeScript(String, String, ScriptExecutor) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager

executeScript(String, String, String, ScriptExecutor) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Executes the given script string (literal javascript) with the specified target and messages the given executor if anything goes wrong.

getGlobalVarName() - Method in interface buscript.StringReplacer
If this does not return null, Buscript will create a global variable in the scripting environment with this as a name and StringReplacer.getReplacement() as a value.

getReplacement() - Method in interface buscript.StringReplacer

P

pluginDisable(PluginDisableEvent) - Method in class buscript.BuscriptListener
Listens for the plugin implementing Buscript to be disabled so that Buscript can be shut down properly.
pluginDisable(PluginDisableEvent) - Method in class buscript.VaultListener
Listens for vault to be disabled so that buscript can unhook it's API.
pluginEnable(PluginEnableEvent) - Method in class buscript.VaultListener
This handler listens for Vault to be enabled so that it's api can be hooked even if the plugin implementing Buscript does not depend on Vault.

Adds a new StringReplacer to this Buscript instance which will allow built in global script functions to replace strings as defined by the replacer.
runScriptFunction(Object, String, Object...) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager

setScriptVariable(String, Object) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Creates/sets a variable for use in the global scope.
stringReplace(String) - Method in class buscript.ScriptManager
Loops through all StringReplacers registered with this Buscript object and replaces their regex strings with their replacement string and returns the result.
StringReplacer - Interface in buscript
Represents a regex string, usually something simple like "%t" to be replaced by another string.
stringReplacers - Variable in class buscript.ScriptManager
